mapper.update: update order_info set order_status=#{orderStatus},pay_status=#{payStatus},update_by=#{updateBy}, update_time=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where order_id = #{orderId}
mapper.select: SELECT a.product_name as product,b.create_time as new_consume_time FROM order_detail a, (SELECT order_id,create_time FROM order_info WHERE member_id=#{memberId} AND order_status NOT IN ('0','4') AND pay_status='1' ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 1) b WHERE a.order_id = b.order_id
mapper.update: update order_info set receive_code=#{receiveCode},receive_time=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where order_id = #{orderId} and order_status =2
update order_info set receive_code ='@zx',receive_time=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where order_id = #{orderId}
mapper.select: SELECT order_id FROM order_info WHERE 1=1 AND order_status=0 AND DATE_ADD(create_time,INTERVAL 30 MINUTE) >= NOW()
SELECT order_id FROM order_info WHERE 1=1 AND DATE_ADD(receive_time,INTERVAL 10 MINUTE) >= NOW() AND order_status = 2 AND receive_code !='@zx'

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') AS trante,COUNT(DISTINCT(member_id)) AS acount FROM order_info WHERE 1=1
and member_id in (
'${member_id}'
)
AND DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 7 DAY),'%Y-%m-%d')
AND distributor_id = #{distributorId} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') DESC
